commands.name: az network vnet tap create
commands.syntax:
az network vnet tap create --destination
                           --name
                           --resource-group
                           [--location]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--port]
                           [--tags]

commands.name: az network vnet tap delete
commands.syntax:
az network vnet tap delete [--ids]
                           [--name]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--yes]

commands.name: az network vnet tap show
commands.summary: Get the details of a virtual network tap.

commands.name: az network vnet tap update
commands.summary: Update settings of a virtual network tap.
commands.syntax:
az network vnet tap update [--add]
                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--ids]
                           [--name]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--remove]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--set]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--tags]

commands.name: az network vnet tap wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
